With [modified xp cd](http://www.ngine.de/article/id/8 "External link") i Succeeded to install and run xp from usb but its **work only on pc that its install on** ..... i tray to update the driver to "advance computer" and to "standard ide" **but steel work only on the first pc** Any ideas???

forumNotes.author: Wonko the Sane
forumNotes.content:
> FYI. I sent the menu files to anyone who requested by email.....

Sure, but why not simply posting them on the board? :wink:  

The general idea of the Board is about sharing your work and ideas publicly. ![:ranting2:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/ranting2.gif)  

> about the xp boot... i will read....  
>
> Because I already have a custom installation disc for usb I prefer a solution of the rest of the way and not from the beginning
Yep, that's why I pointed you also at the "historical thread", where you may find the reasons why the method is done like that and possibly found your own "derived" way.  

![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif)  
Wonko
